name: spawn-a-neko
description: Embed a popup menu for users to spawn oneko-like nekos on your website

scripts.build: npx rimraf lib && npx tsc -p tsconfig.commonjs.json && npx renamer --find .js --replace .cjs lib/commonjs/**/*.js && npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && npx renamer --find .js --replace .mjs lib/esm/**/*.js && npx rollup lib/esm/index.mjs --file spawn-a-neko.js --format umd --name SpawnANeko

author: SCP-iota
